data.message: Fix intent gate blocking learning operations: Identified as system bug per user guidance: improvement loop must be frictionless. store_fact and store_decision blocked by intent gate even in normal conversation flow. Created fallback design-gym/log.md as parallel source of truth. Need to investigate on_user_message() hook chain.
